title: 公告插件
author: Cassius_Zdq
txt_content: 谁有最简便的公告插件，发一下链接。

replies.txt_content:
不了解您的游戏版本 , 我多推荐一些 自行选择

automessage 1.10-1.46 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=626370
msgsend 1.6.2-1.7.10 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=449389
Title 1.8 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=372612
BossBarReloaded 1.7-1.8 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=539035

replies.author: passage-of-time
replies.txt_content: 公告不用插件，用命令方块就行

passage-of-time 发表于 2017-2-15 17:55
